mean_en: medical treatment of injuries or diseases that involves cutting open a person’s body and often removing or replacing some parts; the branch of medicine connected with this treatment
sentence: They are performing surgery on a patient now.
sentence_trans: 他们正在给一位病人做外科手术。
word_etyma: surger\u003dsurgeon外科医生 + y名词后缀 → surgery外科，外科手术
